string-array.name: discrip
string-array.item: Founders by Jan Koum Brian Acton launches 04/02/2009
Originally developed as Facebook Chat in 2008
Founders by Jack Dorsey,Noah Glass, Biz Stone and Evan Williams launched in July 2006
Founders by Steve Chen,Chad Hurley and Jawed Karim launches 14/02/2005
Founders by Zahti ,Priit and Tallinn, Danish developer Janus and Zennstrom launched Aug 2003
Founders Talmon Marco, Igor Magazinnik launched 02/12/2010
LinkedIn is founded by Reid Hoffman and 4 other friends.Launched 5 May 2003.
Original author Ralph Harik Developer Imo, Inc. Initial release 2005
It is developed in 2005 by PageBites
Original author Kevin Systrom Mike Krieger launched October 6, 2010
Founded by Zhang Yiming launched was in September 2017 by ByteDance
Founder Jason Hu launched in July 2017
Snapchat was created by Evan Spiegel,Bobby Murphy and Reggie Brown launched in September 2011
SHAREit was founded in April 2015 with Michael Qiu.
Messenger Lite launch is a no-brainer for Kenya launched in October 2016
Facebook Lite to launch in developed countries. Launched in August 2013
Exclusively launched for India on 22nd February
nstagram Lite has been launched in 170 countries today, March 12, 2021
Created by Paul Buchheit launched in 01/04/2004
Google Drive developed by Google. Launched on April 24,2012

resources.string:
Assalamualaikum.


My Name is Md.Samiul Alim Jony.My Hometown is chapai-Nawabganj,Rajshahi,Bagnladesh. 

This app any objection so you can inform myself. Go Menu option Then click Feedback Option then type your name and Message Then Click sent Button.
Thanks for using this Apps.
